item.title: Open Source Contributions
item.description: delta-io/delta-rs - Contributor Description: Library containing Rust APIs for accessing Delta tables. Also contains bindings for higher-level languages such as Python. Contributions: Worked on creating new functionality in the Rust API, including a low level create table method. apache/arrow-datafusion - Contributor Description: Query execution framework using Apache Arrow as its in-memory format. Supports both SQL and DataFrame APIs. Contributions: Modified schema checking for parquet files, so differing metadata would be ignored.
